entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Strongbox Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫3.999,99 [‚Ç∫2.999,99 ~ ‚Ç∫6.999,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫3.999,99

In-App Purchases

  • Annual TipÔºö‚Ç∫239,99
  • Monthly TipÔºö‚Ç∫35,99
  • Huge TipÔºö‚Ç∫9.999,99
  • Large TipÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99
  • Medium TipÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Small TipÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Little TipÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Strongbox Pro is available here for outright and upfront purchase instead of via an In-App Purchase upgrade. This version of Strongbox is identical to the much loved Strongbox application with all the Pro features and the same regular update schedule. Strongbox is an application for keeping all your passwords safely stored and protected by one master password. Supporting the open source Password Safe and KeePass formats. *** Supports Family Sharing *** *** Features *** - Face ID/Touch ID Unlock for the ultimate in convenience, security and speed. - PIN Code Unlock with a Duress PIN option for those tricky situations. - Passkey support - The latest, most convenient and most secure authentication method (passkeys). - YubiKey protection - secure your databases with a hardware token. - Secure - protected by time tested military grade cryptography. - Private - Isolated In-App attachments viewer for your sensitive documents, photos & videos. - Audit your passwords - Automatically check your database for weak passwords including a 'Have I Been Pwned?' check. - Cloud Support, so you can access your cloud safes using iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV or SFTP even when offline. Use the built in Files app for many other storage options or store them securely only on your local device. You choose your storage. - Search your entire set of passwords and secrets instantly and powerfully, with deep search. Autocomplete new entries, and auto generate secure passwords. - Compatible - Import/Export by Files app, Email, CSV, iTunes File Sharing or use cloud storage. - Standards compliant - using the time tested Password Safe and KeePass formats so you can import any existing password safe you have. - Features galore - Incredibly configurable password generation including Diceware (XKCD) & regular passwords. - Timed Auto Clear Clipboard. - Entry History. - KeePass Field References, Tags, Custom Icon & FavIcons (including automatic search & download). - Two Factor Authentication codes (TOTP) - QR Code, Steam & Manual. --------------------------------------------------------------------- ‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase ‚Ä¢ Strongbox Privacy Policy may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy/ ‚Ä¢ Strongbox Terms of Use may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: SmallFish Chess for Stockfish
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store. SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking. SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised. Features --------- - Blunder checking - Multiple line analysis - Graphical evaluation of your game - Game previews - Dark mode support - Endgame tablebase - Opening books Why not just download and try it yourself?

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced ToolsÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫49,99 [‚Ç∫49,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced ToolsÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Today‚Äôs Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization ‚Ä¢ Unlimited notes storage ‚Ä¢ Multiple note colors ‚Ä¢ Pinned & private notes ‚Ä¢ Custom font styles & font sizes ‚Ä¢ Sort notes by name or date ‚Ä¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time ‚Ä¢ Easy note sharing ‚Ä¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security ‚Ä¢ App lock with multiple passcode options ‚Ä¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync ‚Ä¢ iCloud sync for notes ‚Ä¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications ‚Ä¢ Widget for today‚Äôs notes ‚Ä¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager ‚Ä¢ Create and manage PDF files ‚Ä¢ Edit existing PDFs ‚Ä¢ Export notes as PDF ‚Ä¢ Share PDFs easily ‚Ä¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs ‚Ä¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. We‚Äôre committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

Application Screenshot

iPad

Application Description

Python ÁÇ∫ÁÜ±ÈñÄÁöÑÁ®ãÂºèË™ûË®Ä‰πã‰∏ÄÔºå‰∏≠Ëã±ÊñáÂ≠∏ÁøíË≥áÊ∫êÈÉΩÁê≥ÁëØÊªøÁõÆÔºåÁÑ°Ë´ñÊòØÁ∂≤Ë∑Ø‰∏äÂÖçË≤ªÁöÑÊàñÊòØÊõ∏Â∫óË£°Ë≤©Ë≥£ÁöÑÊõ∏Á±çÔºåËÆÄËÄÖÂèØ‰ª•ÊâæÂà∞ÂêÑÂºèÂêÑÈ°ûÁöÑÊïôÊùêÔºåÁõÆÂâç‰∏≠„ÄÅËã±ÊñáÂ≠∏ÁøíË≥áÊ∫êÈÉΩÂæàË±êÂØåÔºåÁÑ°Ë´ñÊòØÁ∂≤Ë∑Ø‰∏äÂÖçË≤ªÁöÑÊàñÊòØÊõ∏Â∫óË£°Ë≤©Ë≥£ÁöÑÊõ∏Á±çÔºåÂÖ•ÈñÄÊõ∏Á±çÊñπÈù¢ÔºåÊÉüÁç®Áº∫Â∞ëÁõ¥Êé•Â∏∂È†òËÆÄËÄÖÂ≠∏ÁøíÈñãÁôºËªüÈ´îÁöÑÊïôÊùêÔºåÊ≠§‰∫¶Êú¨Êõ∏ÁöÑË®≠Ë®àÁêÜÂøµÔºåÂ∏åÊúõËóâÁî±Â∏∂È†òËÆÄËÄÖÈñãÁôºÁ∞°ÂñÆÁöÑÊáâÁî®ËªüÈ´îÔºå‰ª•Ê≠§Â∏∂Áµ¶ËÆÄËÄÖÂÆåÊï¥ÁöÑËªüÈ´îÈñãÁôºËßÄÂøµ„ÄÇ Êú¨Êõ∏ÂàÜÊàêÂõõÂ§ßÈÉ®ÂàÜÔºåÊØè‰∏ÄÈÉ®ÂàÜÂèàÂàÜÊàê 8 Âà∞ 21 ÂÄãÂñÆÂÖÉÔºåÈ¶ñÂÖàÊòØ„ÄåÂü∫Á§éÂ≠∏ÁøíÁØá„ÄçÔºå„ÄåÂü∫Á§éÂ≠∏ÁøíÁØá„ÄçÁöÑÂ≠∏ÁøíÁõÆÊ®ôÂåÖÊã¨Ë™çË≠ò Python „ÄÅÊÄéÈ∫ºËôïÁêÜË≥áÊñô„ÄÅÊéßÂà∂ÁµêÊßã„ÄÅÊ®°ÁµÑÂåñ„ÄÅÁâ©‰ª∂Â∞éÂêëÂèäÁ®ãÂºèÊñá‰ª∂ÔºåÈÄôÈÉ®ÂàÜÁ¥ØË®àÂçÅ‰∏âÂÄãÂñÆÂÖÉÔºåÈ†êË®àÂ∏∂È†òËÆÄËÄÖÂ≠∏ÊúÉÂØ´Á∞°ÂñÆÁöÑ Python Â∞èÁ®ãÂºèÔºåÂÖ∑ÂÇôÂØ´Â∞èÁ®ãÂºèÁöÑËÉΩÂäõ‰πãÂæåÔºåÂ∞±ÈÄ≤ÂÖ•Êé•‰∏ã‰æÜÁöÑ„ÄåËªüÈ´îÈñãÁôºÁØá„Äç„ÄÇ „ÄåËªüÈ´îÈñãÁôºÁØá„ÄçÁöÑÂ≠∏ÁøíÁõÆÊ®ôÁÇ∫ÈñãÁôº„ÄÅÊ∏¨Ë©¶„ÄÅÈô§ÈåØÂèäÈáçÊßãÔºåÈÄôÈÉ®ÂàÜÁ¥ØË®àÂÖ´ÂÄãÂñÆÂÖÉÔºåÁõÆÁöÑÊòØËÆìËÆÄËÄÖ‰∫ÜËß£ÂÆåÊï¥ÁöÑËªüÈ´îÈñãÁôºÊ¶ÇÂøµÂèäÊµÅÁ®ãÔºåÂêåÊôÇÈñãÁôºÂæÄÂæå„ÄåGUIÁØá„ÄçÂèä„ÄåBrythonÁØá„ÄçÁöÑË®àÁÆóÊ†∏ÂøÉÈ°ûÂà• Encrypt ÔºåÂ∏∂ËÆÄËÄÖÊ∑±ÂÖ•‰∫ÜËß£Â¶Ç‰ΩïË®≠Ë®àÈ°ûÂà•ÔºåÊ≠§ÂæåÂÖàÈÄ≤ÂÖ•„ÄåGUIÁØá„ÄçÔºåÂà©Áî®Ê®ôÊ∫ñÁ®ãÂºèÂ∫´ÁöÑ GUI Ê®°ÁµÑ Tk ÊõøË®àÁÆóÊ†∏ÂøÉË®≠Ë®àË¶ñÁ™óÊáâÁî®ËªüÈ´î„ÄÇ „ÄåGUIÁØá„ÄçÁöÑÂ≠∏ÁøíÁõÆÊ®ôÁÇ∫ÈñãÁôº Tk ÊáâÁî®ËªüÈ´îÔºå‰ª•ÈñãÁôºÊµÅÁ®ãÁÇ∫‰∏ªÔºåÈ¶ñÂÖà‰ªãÁ¥πÂà©Áî®Ê°ÜÊû∂ÈñãÁôºÂ∏∏Ë¶ãÁöÑ MVC Ê®°ÂºèÔºåÈÄ£Â∏∂‰ªãÁ¥πÂª∫Á´ãÁ∞°ÂñÆ Tk Á®ãÂºèÁöÑÊ¶ÇÂøµÔºåÊé•‰∏ã‰æÜÊîπÁî®È°ûÂà•Ë®≠Ë®à GUI Ôºå Encrypt ÁÇ∫ M ÁöÑÈÉ®ÂàÜÔºå V ÁöÑÈÉ®ÂàÜÁÇ∫ EncryptView ÔºåËÄå C ÁöÑÈÉ®ÂàÜÁÇ∫ EncryptController ÔºåÁ∞°ÂñÆË™™Ôºå M Â∞±ÊòØË®àÁÆóÊ†∏ÂøÉÈ°ûÂà•Ôºå V ÁÇ∫Áî® Tk Âª∫Á´ãË¶ñÁ™óÁöÑÈ°ûÂà•Ôºå C ÂâáÊòØË≤†Ë≤¨Ê∫ùÈÄö M Ëàá V ÁöÑÈ°ûÂà•„ÄÇ „ÄåBrythonÁØá„ÄçÁ∑äÊé•Âú®„ÄåGUIÁØá„Äç‰πãÂæåÔºå Brython ÊòØÂà©Áî® JavaScript ÂØ¶‰ΩúÁöÑ Python Áõ¥Ë≠ØÂô®ÔºåÈÄôË£°ÊòØË¶ÅÊääÈÅãÁî®Ë®àÁÆóÊ†∏ÂøÉÁöÑ Encrypt È°ûÂà•ÁßªÊ§çÂà∞ÁÄèË¶ΩÂô®‰∏äÔºåÂêåÊôÇÂª∂Á∫å„ÄåGUIÁØá„ÄçÁµêÂêà„ÄåÂü∫Á§éÂ≠∏ÁøíÁØá„ÄçÁöÑÂÖßÂÆπÈÄ≤‰∏ÄÊ≠•Á§∫ÁØÑ Python Áõ¥Ë≠ØÂô®ÔºåË´ãÂÖàÂèÉËÄÉ Brython ÂÆòÁ∂≤ÁöÑ‰ªãÁ¥π„ÄÇ Êú¨ App ÁØÑ‰æãÂèäÁ∑¥ÁøíÂ∫ï‰∏ãÊúÉÊúâÊ®°Êì¨Âü∑Ë°åÁµêÊûúÊåâÈàïÔºåÊåâ‰∏ãÂ∞±ÊúÉÂú®Â∫ï‰∏ãÂá∫ÁèæÊ®°Êì¨Âü∑Ë°åÁµêÊûú„ÄÇ Ëá≥ÊñºÁØÑ‰æãÂèäÁ∑¥Áøí‰∏äÊñπÊúÉÊúâ entry.content:

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

  • Raider Mk. 2Ôºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Raider Mk. 3Ôºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Raider Mk. 1Ôºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • Raider WeeklyÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Enemy drop list, guides and quest-line guides. - Interactive Maps - Sort and Filter - Event Timers and Notifications - Guides for Quests Guides and Maps are partially available for free, but a Pro membership is required to access all content Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Unboxing the Cryptic Killer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫79,99 [‚Ç∫79,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫79,99

Application Description

SOLVE A CRYPTIC BOX Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is the first standalone chapter to the cooperative point-and-click puzzle game series 'Cryptic Killer'. Join forces with a friend and play as detective partners Ally and Old Dog in our debut two-player escape room adventure. IMPORTANT: "Unboxing the Cryptic Killer" is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game, that requires each player to have their own copy on either mobile, tablet, PC or Mac. Internet connection and voice communication are essential. Need a Player Two? Join our Discord community! Two seasoned detectives, Ally and Old Dog, are entangled in a chilling unsolved case. Lured on a perilous trail, they fall into the clutches of the enigmatic Cryptic Killer they've been relentlessly pursuing. The stakes are sky-high as two innocent lives hang in the balance. In order to save them, Ally and Old Dog must unravel a box of intricate puzzles masterfully designed by the nefarious killer. Test your mettle and join this high-stakes race against time, where every puzzle solved is a step closer to unmasking the Cryptic Killer. THE ONLY WAY TO ESCAPE IS TO WORK TOGETHER Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is a puzzle for exactly two players. The name of the game is collaboration. Each player takes on one of the two roles and works their way through a series of challenging puzzles. You'll each see one half of the same puzzle and must work together to crack the codes and escape the Cryptic Killer's clutches. FEATURES LIST ‚ñ∂Two Player Co-Op In Unboxing the Cryptic Killer, the detectives are separated. You‚Äôll see different items and clues than your partner, and will be tested on your communication! ‚ñ∂Challenging Collaborative Puzzles Two brains are better than one when it comes to cracking the Cryptic Killer's codes. ‚ñ∂Unravel a Thrilling Story Track the Cryptic Killer's movements as Detectives Old Dog and Ally in this ongoing murder mystery saga. ‚ñ∂Explore Illustrated Worlds Unboxing the Cryptic Killer features hand-illustrated environments that are inspired by noir novels. ‚ñ∂Draw on‚Ä¶ Everything! You cannot solve a case without taking notes. At any time in the game, you can whip out a notebook and pen to make notes and scribble on your environment.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: TRINITY TRIGGER
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99 [‚Ç∫249,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

„ÄÄ„ÄÄ„ÄÄ[Caution] Before purchasing or using this application, please be sure to read the [Notes on this application] at the bottom of the page. As Cyan, a young man burdened by the gods with the mantle of Warrior of Chaos and an inevitable clash against the Warrior of Order, players will set out on a grand adventure to defy fate and save Trinitia. Cyan and his companions Elise and Zantis are accompanied by strange creatures known as Triggers that can transform into eight types of weapons, and players can switch freely between the three characters to implement a solo combat strategy Together, they will write a new destiny. Master the Weapons of the Gods Solve puzzles and defeat enemies traverse the dungeons of each Arma, towers made from the fallen weapons of the gods. Seek Out Trinitia‚Äôs Mysteries Reveal hidden passages by exploring every last bit of Trinitia‚Äôs diverse biomes. Chat with townsfolk for clues to uncover the heavily guarded secrets held in these forests, deserts, snowfields, and more. Change the Tide of Battle Make expert use of the Weapon Wheel in battle to change between eight weapon types on the fly. Every enemy has a weakness‚Äîfinding and exploiting it is the key to victory. A Generational Role-Playing Epic Trinity Trigger was inspired by the iconic RPGs of yesteryear, but its accessible and rewarding gameplay incorporates modern flourishes to make it an exciting new adventure for players of all ages. [Notes on this application] ‚ñº‚ñ≥‚ñº Operating Environment ‚ñº‚ñ≥‚ñº iOS 12.0 or later *Only officially released operating systems are supported. We do not guarantee that you will be able to play the game comfortably. ‚ñº‚ñ≥‚ñº Recommended Devices ‚ñº‚ñ≥‚ñº iPhone 11 or later, iPad 7th generation or later Internal memory (RAM): 2GB or more ‚ñº‚ñ≥‚ñº Recommended Play ‚ñº‚ñ≥‚ñº This application has an auto-save function, However, in order to avoid unexpected situations, it is recommended to ‚Äúsave often‚Äù. Starting the application while multiple applications are running may cause unstable operation. To ensure stable play, we recommend that you play the game with other apps down. ‚ñº‚ñ≥‚ñº Disclaimer ‚ñº‚ñ≥‚ñº 1. Please note that support will not be provided for operation on OS versions other than the supported OS versions. 2. due to customer usage conditions and model-specific factors, even with a compatible model, operation may be unstable or may not work properly. 3. Even if ‚ÄúiOSXXX or higher‚Äù is listed as the supported OS version, it does not necessarily mean that the latest version is supported. 4. It may take some time to start the game after the application is launched depending on the model. 5. A frame may appear on the screen depending on the model. Refunds (including exchanges for other products or services) will not be accepted for any reason. ¬© FURYU Corporation.

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put it‚Äù! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.
